description: Grading the curation level of schemas

sf.aa_query:
with temp_table as (SELECT *, ((CASE WHEN CUST_FIELD_1 IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + (CASE WHEN CUST_FIELD_2 IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + (CASE WHEN CUST_FIELD_3 IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + (CASE WHEN CUST_FIELD_4 IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + (CASE WHEN CUST_FIELD_5 IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + (CASE WHEN CUST_FIELD_6 IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + (CASE WHEN CUST_FIELD_7 IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + (CASE WHEN CUST_FIELD_8 IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + (CASE WHEN CUST_FIELD_9 IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + (CASE WHEN CUST_FIELD_10 IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) AS grade FROM public.rdbms_schemas WHERE deleted = 'false')
select *, CASE WHEN grade < 1 THEN 'Gold' WHEN grade < 6 THEN 'Silver' ELSE 'Bronze' END as c_grade from temp_table;
sf.last_etl: SELECT last_load_time from information_schema.load_history where table_name = 'STG_RDBMS_SCHEMAS' ORDER BY last_load_time DESC LIMIT 1
